## Description
The Spawner Progression mod! This mod allows you to only allow breaking specific spawners after killing X mobs. This mod is configurable by going to your config folder and finding the file spawnerprogression.yml. Nice adventures! Our mod works with both sides! (Client-Side only and Server-Side only). Join our [discord](https://discord.gg/wQj53Hy) for more information about all our mods and plugins!

## Versions:

This mod is available for Fabric and Forge in these versions: [1.12](https://github.com/Picono435/RandomTP/tree/1.12.2), [1.15 & 1.14](https://github.com/Picono435/RandomTP/tree/1.15.2), [1.16](https://github.com/Picono435/RandomTP/tree/1.16.5) and [1.17](https://github.com/Picono435/RandomTP/tree/1.17.1). Other versions may also work but are not tested, and we do not recommend you to use them.
